text:
据わった目でフーフー荒く呼吸してなんなら半勃ちになりながら「本当にいいのか？」 とか「きつかったら遠慮なく言ってくれ」とか気を使う、言ってることと見た目が合ってない、みたいなことがありそう
ここまで持ちこたえといてさらにもう一段階踏み込むと「もう後悔しても遅いからな」とか言い出す(驚いたことにこのセリフは公式なんですね〜)
たぶん「俺は警告したぞ明日どうなっても知らないからな」とかも言うだろ
この解像度の高さリアルだな〜〜〜嫌だわ〜〜〜(笑)
trans:
With intense eyes and heavy, shallow breaths, possibly even half-erect, he'd say things like, "Are you really okay with this?" or "If it's too much, don't hesitate to tell me." The mismatch between his considerate words and his appearance would be striking.
If things escalate one step further, he'd probably say something like, "It's too late to regret this now," (and, surprisingly, this line is official-amazing, isn't it?)
He'd likely add, "I warned you, so what ever happens tomorrow, it's not my problem."
The level of detail in this description is disturbingly vivid-so real it's almost unbearable (haha).
